price: Iyo abagarariji babwiwe bati: “Nimwubamire Nyenimpuhwe Allah maze mumusenge”, baca binamura bakavuga bati: “Iyo Mana Allah Nyenimpuhwe nta Yo tuzi namba, dupfe kuyubamira gusa kuko ubidutegetse!”; iryo rarikirwa ryo kwubamira Nyenimpuhwe Allah, ryabongerereje ubugaba bwo kutikebuka ngo bemere[5].
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ قَالُواْ وَمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ أَنَسۡجُدُ لِمَا تَأۡمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمۡ نُفُورٗا۩
footnotes: [5] Iyo usomye iyi Aayah gushika ku mpera, usabwa guca wubama.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu us'judū lilrraḥmāni qālū wamā al-raḥmānu anasjudu limā tamurunā wazādahum nufūran
